output_list.reason: The mintToken function allows anyone to mint tokens, which is not secure as it can be used to distribute tokens to anyone without authorization.
The transfer function allows anyone to transfer tokens, which is not secure as it can be used to transfer tokens to anyone without authorization.
The transferFrom function allows anyone to transfer tokens on behalf of others, which is not secure as it can be used to transfer tokens to anyone without authorization.
The buy function allows anyone to buy tokens, which is not secure as it can be used to buy tokens without authorization.
The sell function allows anyone to sell tokens, which is not secure as it can be used to sell tokens without authorization.
